content: [EDIT] 8/3/2022Backed.Finance bounty rewards have been distributed.TXIDs:https://bscscan.com/tx/0x77ca93d23dc5e846f2ee4cea8af0ceb850f933fd99ba235352a8dca6dc35919chttps://bscscan.com/tx/0x2b320eb7fada10f69df46f06907d2120fbcba584f8627e53416cc10c5f21a667https://bscscan.com/tx/0x384327999d73d2df7c6ca33e7d6f055aa0d0958e8981b457c121ad9fb5862894https://bscscan.com/tx/0xf7b2888c55ae7a8036971775fafbcc95265f6dc6fcca1dc6eade22e2344b8119For inquiries about exchange listings, token prices, join the discussion on their ann thread:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5403653.0No further inquiries about this bounty campaign will be entertained here.Backed.Finance bounty campaign has officially ended.Spreadsheet will be finalized and the bounty rewards will be sent within 1 to 2 weeks.  [WEBSITE]   [LINKEDIN]   [TWITTER]   [ANN THREAD]   [LITEPAPER]   [OPEN APP]   [AIRDROP]  Disclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. Join (on this bounty campaign)or Invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO) at your own risk.
